headline: 3 Reasons MTB is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: M&T Bank trades at $214.01 per share and has stayed right on track with the overall market, gaining 10.2% over the last six months. At the same time, the S&P 500 has returned 8.2%.
